title: Dark Places (2C55)
text:
Set:	Mines of Moria
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Moria
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. Each unique [Moria] minion is strength +1. Shadow: Spot an opponent's site to replace it with your marsh or underground site of the same number.
Lore:	”'There is some new devilry here… devised for our welcome, no doubt.'”
Rarity:	C
Notes:	This card can replace sites only in the Fellowship block format.
